subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis pitching staff lost Kyle Lohse and Chris Carpenter, and the team signed no free agents, but it still has one of the best starting rotations in the majors.
snippet: The St. Louis pitching staff lost Kyle Lohse and Chris Carpenter, and the team signed no free agents, but it still has one of the best starting rotations in the majors.
